title: STOCK MARKET HAS CRASHED: DR. HARSHA; NO CONNECTION WITH BUDGET: DR. RANJITH
content: November 24, 2010: The stock market has crashed, says Dr. Harsha De Silva, the United National Party (UNP) parliamentarian commenting on the budget, while Dr. Ranjith Bandara, Chairman of the Sri Lanka Foundation, says that there is no connection between the downturn of the Stock Market and the Budget. “The performance of the stock market…
